text: Bella Hadid Celebrates 10 Million Instagram Followers in a Sexy Swarovski Dress -- See the Pic! by Jennifer Drysdale 1:50 PM   Photo: Getty Images Congratulations to Bella Hadid! The 20-year-old model celebrated 10 million Instagram followers on Wednesday, while looking like a million bucks in a sexy Swarovski dress by Alexandre Vauthier. WATCH: Bella Hadid Unfollows Selena Gomez on Instagram After Singer Is Spotted Kissing The Weeknd -- See the Pics! "10m of you!?...such a wild numberüòçüòá thank you for your support always.. such a blessing..I love every single one of you‚ù§üïä‚ù§üïä‚ù§üïä," she captioned a candid black-and-white shot of herself crystal-clad backstage at the Alexandre Vauthier show. A photo posted by Bella Hadid (@bellahadid) on Jan 25, 2017 at 6:41am PST RELATED: Are Bella Hadid and Selena Gomez Feuding Over The Weeknd? Here's What Everyone Is Saying! Hadid sported the sexy, backless dress the day before as she opened the Vauthier show at Paris Fashion week. "Thank you to my love @alexandrevauthier for having me open your incredible show...always an honor to work for you and walk my dream incredible @swarovski dress..you amaze me more and more everyday ‚ù§," she wrote on Instagram on Tuesday. Photo: Getty Images WATCH: Bella Hadid and The Weeknd Have First Run-In Since Selena Gomez Romance Drama While Hadid's Swarovski number left little to the imagination, the young model definitely isn't afraid to show some skin. On Monday night, Hadid freed the nipple when she arrived at the Dior masquerade ball in a totally sheer gown. See the bold look in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
